snippet.title: Crater Song Definitive Edition NES Trailer
snippet.description:
This is the digital launch trailer for the Definitive Edition of Crater Song on the NES.

Crater Song is a short, single-player co-op adventure puzzle game for the 8-bit NES based within the sci-fi fantasy world of Orebody.

In this unique NES game, players hold controllers 1 AND 2 sideways, like Switch Joycons (see below), and control two characters simultaneously, the twins Arco and Menuett. Crater Song is inspired by the game Brothers: A Tale of Two Sons.

Like what you see? Grab the game here: https://johnvanderhoef.itch.io/crater-song
